headline: BXP and Starr Announce Lease Signing at BXP’s 343 Madison Avenue in Midtown Manhattan
summary: BOSTON, January 07, 2026--BXP (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today the signing of an approximately 275,000 square foot, 20-year lease with Starr, a global investment and insurance organization, at 343 Madison Avenue, a 930,000 square foot premier workplace currently under construction, with direct access to Grand Central’s Madison Concourse between 44th and 45th Street.
